title: Shaw Cable ISP down
body:
One of Canada's major ISP'S Shaw Cable crashed and is currently undergoing maintenance. Of course I found this out in a ranked game, Loss Forgiven Rito?
This is mostly just a heads up that it isn't league client related.
Hopefully it's fixed soon.

replies.body: Oh wow, that sucks to hear.  Hopefully everything will smooth out in no time.  It's not up to me to enable loss forgiven, more of a switch flipped by our devs.  It enables it for everyone though, and reserved during really extreme or widespread cases.  I too hope it's fixed up soon, and I'll keep an eye out.
